Headlines.caption: Blanking on a chemistry question this week spurred an identity crisis, a Breaking Bad reference, and a tender look back on all the chemists that have been a part of my life.

Projects.title: Bob Ross Search

Projects.caption: Begin every Internet browsing session with artistic wisdom from Bob Ross.  These artistic aphorisms will never fail to uplift, renew, and inspire.  Bookmark it today!
